dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S2364 IS: To direct the United States Postal Service to designate single, unique ZIP Codes for certain communities, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Barrasso (for himself and Ms. Lummis) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

form.official-title: To direct the United States Postal Service to designate single, unique ZIP Codes for certain communities, and for other purposes.

section.header: Single, unique zip codes for certain communities
section.text: Not later than 270 days after the date of enactment of this Act, the United States Postal Service shall designate a single, unique ZIP Code for each of the following communities:
